title: shrImadAdi tyAgarAja
sahitya:
shrImadAdi tyAgarAja guruvaram namAmyaham


anupallavi

  bhUmijA ramaNa caraNa kamala bhajana dhurandharam


caraNam    sakala lOka samsEvita sangIta sAhitya sAra bharitasu lalitapada sammELana samshObhita
			(madhyamakAlam)
sankIrtana su-racana samupArjita sat-kIrtim sura munivara kAruNya samjAta su-jnAnam 
sAmagAna lOla vAsudEva hrdaya su-sthitam sujana hrdaya jaladhi candra mamalavamsha samjAtam
